data.name: May God Forgive Us
data.detailed_description:
Gamepad controls

keyboard 1-4 quick selection inventory slots. Move forward = Gamepad Left Thumbstick Y- Axis Move Right = Gamepad Left Thumbstick X – Axis Turn = Gamepad Left Thumbstick X – Axis Look up = Gamepad Right Thumbstick Y- Axis Jump = A (Bottom Face Button) Fire = RT Back = B (Right Face Button) Interact = X (Left Face Button) Inventory = Y (Top Face Button) Crouch = Left shoulder Sprint = Left thumbstick Equip= Right Shoulder UI UP= D-Pad up UI Down= D-Pad down UI Left= D-pad left UI Right= D-pad right UI Discard= special right Item shortcut slot 1= D-Pad Up Item shortcut slot 2= D-Pad Left Item shortcut slot 3= D-Pad Right Item shortcut slot 4= UI Action 1= LT UI Action 2= RT UI Switch Left = Left Shoulder UI Switch Right = Right Shoulder UI Back = B UI Enter = A UI Interact = X Aim = LT Reload/ Change Batteries = D- Pad Down UI Scroll= Left Thumbstick Up/Down


Keyboard Controls

Keyboard controls keyboard 1-4 quick selection inventory slots Move forward = W Move Left / Right = A / D Turn = X Look up = Mouse Y Jump = Space Bar Fire = Left Mouse Button Back = Esc Interact = E Inventory = Tab Crouch = Left Ctrl Sprint = Left Shift Equip= F UI UP= W UI Down= S UI Left= A UI Right= D UI Discard = X Item shortcut slot 1= 1 Item shortcut slot 2= 2 Item shortcut slot 3= 3 Item shortcut slot 4= 4 UI Action 1= Left Shift UI Action 2= C UI Switch Left =1 UI Switch Right = 3 UI Back = Q UI Enter = Space Bar UI Interact = E Aim = Right Mouse Button Reload/ Change Batteries = R


charitable causes

A proportion of all profits go to the PDSA pet aid hospital UK.


Anti abuse policy

Yakimoto games primary concerns are the welfare of the customers and company. Unfortunately, due to the lack of monitoring and renowned levels of online abuse and practices such as brigading indie companies on the STEAM platform, the company prefer not to engage directly on steam. Please report any bugs via the contact form on the company website www.yakimotogames.com, mental health is everything and must not be compromised, say no to online abuse. Game code by Mr Yakimoto. Some digital assets were developed by third parties, you are not advised to purchase this game if critical against such indie practices. Huge thanks and respect.


CRYPTO TOKEN GIVEAWAY

One lucky player will find an easter egg containing the Private key of a wallet containing BNB (Binance coin) enabling them to import that private key account into their metamask.


About the Game

Stealthily navigate this tense survival horror by managing scarce resources, solving puzzles and when all else fails, fighting to escape the nightmare you've woken up too in the laboratory as you are hunted by the 419 subjects and clean up security teams following the plant explosion. Firearms, combination puzzles, word puzzles, world exploration, Inventory systems with combining and slot options (keyboard 1-4 quick selection inventory slots), multi-character combat large map and different environments, save options, auto save, full gamepad and keyboard automatic sensed options, full sound and graphics options

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K @ 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 8GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Horror theme with jumpscares and gore, violence and death.
